title: Roadgames = Road games [DVD] (D)
subject_group: Crime, Espionage, Justice, Police & Prisons/Serial murderers
abstract: Roadgames (dir. Richard Franklin, 101 min, 1981)--Audio commentary by Richard Franklin--Kangaroo Hitchcock: the Making of Roadgames featurette with Richard Franklin and Stacy Keach (dir. Perry Martin, 20 min, 2003)--Posters and stills gallery--Original storyboards--"Roadgames" theatrical trailer (2 min)--Umbrella theatrical trailers for "Harlequin" (2 min), "Turkey Shoot" (3 min), "Long Weekend" (2 min).
description: A psychopathic killer is haunting the Nullarbor Highway in search of female hitch-hikers whom he picks up, rapes, kills and dismembers. An eccentric, long-haul truck driver determines to track down the murderer and is helped by a young hitch-hiker he picks up. Stars Stacy Keach and Jamie Lee Curtis.
related_objects: Object; R0000894; [Roadgames = Road games : publicity kit]; Richard Franklin; To be Catalogued
